original_title: Spring/Fall Cinesongs For Storm De Hirsch
overview: An homage to Storm De Hirsch (one of the pioneers of the New American Cinema and an early master of the artistic use of super-8 in her wonderful Cine Sonnets). Layered – AB-printed – seasonal images and sounds bursting into being and fading simultaneously.
title: Spring/Fall Cinesongs For Storm De Hirsch
